name: asherdan
text: A comment left by asherdan was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by straw, riotdejaneiro, Thorfinn, DiamondMonster, Carpetbag, chivalress, NDCaesar, tommycrashwreck, caduceo, HolyQ, michellemarie, adonkon, luckypyjamas, mistlethrush, aHatOfPig, LaserBlade, cognitonaut, profbobo, ravindra108, Afkpuz, mashuren, dropkickpikachu, heatbag, trawser)

name: connellingus
text: Most of the content in the 'zines is funnier than this preview. I recommend them.

name: asherdan
text: A comment left by asherdan was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by straw, UntilYouAreSoNude, riotdejaneiro, Dusty, cryztal, Thorfinn, DiamondMonster, Carpetbag, chivalress, clancine, tommycrashwreck, caduceo, michellemarie, luckypyjamas, mistlethrush, cognitonaut, profbobo, ravindra108, Afkpuz, YossarianLives, dropkickpikachu, heatbag, Madoushi, trawser, slalvation)

name: waldo913
text:
by the way- I have my lame-limit turned up to 50 for the specific purpose of not missing out on asherdan non-dickmode posts.

Cheerio.

name: tagrineth
text: Chubbied because I did the same thing, lol.

name: ford
text: mine is at 300.  If i ever have to readjust this i will know for sure that humanity is a failed experiment.

name: feyla
text: whoa, shit. Me too and for the exact same reason. exactly 300, too.

name: wazza
text:
mine is at 1587.

I don't have much faith in humanity left.

name: zapatos
text: You haven't already reached this conclusion?

name: wartooth
text: i got an account and set my threshold at 200, just to see what all the hullabaloo was about

name: njury
text: Same here.

name: lolsworth
text: Man has a sense of humour about his own failings, gotta respect that,

name: lolsworth
text: and furthermore,

name: chaesar
text: A comment left by chaesar was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by karljw, riotdejaneiro, StoatLad, Thorfinn, NeoNaoNeo, goocifer, ohmygooses, ajg, godfatherofsouls, Doc_Rostov, I_Love_Kate, Satyr, emgee, Archon_Divinus, peng33)

name: ibetso
text: I'm not super keen on comments-board bullying but I have to say I agree. Most people try to post decent comments that make Achewood even more enjoyable for everyone, but Asherdan wants to hand out 100% vegan, potassium-enriched, carob covered prunes.

name: waldo913
text: I have no strong feelings against asherdan.  Yes, he's a dick sometimes, but he knows this.  He's also cool sometimes.  At least he's reasonably eloquent, and doesn't have a broken caps-lock key.  Think 'socks'.  I'd rather have 4 asherdan's than 1 socks.

name: semiquaver
text: Socks is basically not much of a problem.  He's too ridiculous and his posts are too infrequent to cause problems.  Asherdan firstposts tripe on most strips and causes a fight.  It starts every assetbar dive with a bad taste in the mouth.  Four asherdans would render assetbar more or less defunct.  Four socks to displace one asherdan, I say.

name: spinynorman
text: After living a quarter of our lives on the internet, I'd say we're completely blind to posts like socks's - all caps, bad spelling, little to now logic, frequently obscene... That's like the chaff of the world wide web.

name: semiquaver
text:
Yes, exactly.

It is remarkable how often Mr. Fry makes me say these words.

name: iseedeadpixels
text: I think we have more of a problem with this poing person... Although in all likelyhood they are one in the same.

name: caduceo
text: cuervo and sunny delight, then warm MGD? jesus christ beef, might as well shoot him.

name: mastronaut
text: VERY terrible might in fact be the only way to describe MGD.

name: lawdog
text: A little passive-aggressive there, Beef. Thank god for the healing power of pool.

name: senseihollywood
text: Onstad snuck in a little salute to Iron Chef at the end there...

name: aaron_haynes
text: A comment left by aaron_haynes was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by pkitty, professorhazard, goocifer, waldo913)

name: tekende
text: If you don't make up your own comment, are you doomed to repeat lines from the strip above?

name: aaron_haynes
text: I am so sorry for doing that 1 years ago. I must really have ruined your whole day.

name: tekende
text: Oh yeah completely

name: stuart
text: Magic underpants narrative returns next.

name: pa_ass_nts
text: This year, the Historical Rapping Society at my university lost its funding and was forced to dissolve after 23 years of bringing quality iambs to the student body.

name: semiquaver
text: Meanwhile, the Yale Historical Raping Society continues full-speed.

name: godfatherofsouls
text: I want to see Ray's paintings please.

name: calenrow
text: My favorite part about this strip is the fact that Beef has diagrammed how Ray talks for the audience, to simulate the experience of the interview.

name: peppill
text: I'm surprised he didn't flowchart it.

name: tekende
text: Beef is kind of a smart-ass here.

name: dovey
text: Does it really need to be restated that Beef has got mad sass?

name: hbaranov
text: Sorry, but the image set, how Ray talks makes this for me.

name: stormagnet
text: This interview brought to you by Elizabot.

name: mustakrakesh
text: This and the previous page are 5's and should be rated as such.

name: sirfrederick
text: Ray paints, apparently.
